eg.ui.tabpane

Class ExtTabbedPaneUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      • javax.swing.plaf.TabbedPaneUI
        • javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTabbedPaneUI
          • eg.ui.tabpane.ExtTabbedPaneUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class ExtTabbedPaneUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicTabbedPaneUI
    Implements a modified appearance of the JTabbedPane and the option to hide the tab bar.

    The background of a selected tab is white; other tabs are in 'normal' gray.
    The tab height can be defined in setHeight(int) and the selected tab is not elevated.
    Tabs are rectangular and aligned at the left edge.
    The content area insets are set to zero and a content border is not painted. The tab area insets are zero except for the lower end where the inset value is one point when the tab bar is visible.
    The tab bar is visible or hidden depending on the value passed in setShowTabs(boolean).
